message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a steal considering its true value, and I'm confident it will be a great asset to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $950,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your interest. However, $950,000 simply isn't enough for me to part with this product. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to see a price closer to my initial offer. How about $1,100,000? It's still a fantastic deal considering the value of the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I can offer $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.
